The footage, captured from a block of flats, shows the suspect making his way up to a taxi, which is waiting for him on the road below.
y_orig: The suspect then jumps out of the cab and runs off.

x_l: A high school student in California who told a fellow student he "came home to a dead body" after a school bus crash was sentenced Friday to six years in prison. x_l: A new study in the Journal of Theoretical Biology reveals that when bacteria are infected by viruses, they can change their behavior in certain ways, allowing them to hide from those viruses while also increasing the number of virus particles in the bacterial cell. In turn, this allows the bacteria to escape infection, although it may require some help from the virus. The study is the first time that scientists have shown that bacteria change their behavior in order to overcome infection.
y_orig: The findings are important because they could help researchers understand how viruses can evade the immune system, which could lead to new ways to combat viral infections.
y_summ: The findings could help scientists better understand how bacteria and viruses interact in the body and how to prevent or treat infections.
